list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the process of making something free from bacteria or other living microorganisms.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: disinfection and sterilization of surgical equipment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khử trùng và khử trùng thiết bị phẫu thuật

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: surgery to make a person or animal unable to produce offspring.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she had three children and had undergone sterilization
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô có ba đứa con và đã trải qua khử trùng
